title: How to delete programs on a TI-84 Plus CE - Quora

response.answer_text: Go to 2nd-Mem (above the plus sign), then select 2:Mem Mgmt. Arrow down to Pgrm (it’s the seventh one on my model) and select that. A list of your programs will appear; “enter” next to the ones that you want to delete — a * will appear next to the ones you select. Hit the Del button, confirm it, and they are gone!
